api_list.name: Get the details for job
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://harryanderson35-odesktemp.p.rapidapi.com/client/companies/123456/openings/1234565"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harryanderson35-odesktemp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "harryanderson35-odesktemp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search jobs

optional_parameters.name: c1
optional_parameters.description: Category name, for now the full list of categories

optional_parameters.name: c2
optional_parameters.description: Subcategory, which is related to category (c1)

optional_parameters.name: fb
optional_parameters.description: Limit your search to buyers with at least a score of the number passed in this parameter.

optional_parameters.name: wl
optional_parameters.description: Hours per week; As Needed < 10 Hours/Week = '0',  Part Time: 10-30 hrs/week = '20',  Full Time: 30+ hrs/week = '40'

optional_parameters.name: dur
optional_parameters.description: Engagement duration; Ongoing / More than 6 months = '26' 3 to 6 months = '13' 1 to 3 months = '4' Less than 1 month = '1' Less than 1 week = '0'

optional_parameters.name: st
optional_parameters.description: Status for search; Open Jobs = 'Open' Jobs in Progress = 'In Progress' Completed Jobs = 'Completed' Canceled Jobs = 'Cancelled'

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Paging, based on offset;count, e.g. 0;10 - return 10 records, starting from 0

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: Sorting, in format $field_name1;$field_name2;..$field_nameN;AD...A, where A eq. asc, D eq. desc, e.g. date_posted;A
